attributes.action: To make sure that the free bus permit is free to all those eligible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Medway Council has put a £75 charge on the companion element of the free bus permits for the disabled.  This means that a section of people, who are unable to travel unaccompanied are discriminated and that it is NOT FREE.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
